TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SpeakStartedEventArgs extends System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptEventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks 实例<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs>时，将创建<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>对象会引发<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>事件。 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>将引发<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>事件时开始说话的提示符下使用任一<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>，或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>方法。
<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs>类不具有任何属性，且不返回数据从<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>事件。 它用于启用应用程序作者编写事件处理程序<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>事件。
